data.title: Chris Alexander on LinkedIn: AUSactive National Awards Program
data.meta_description: Great to see the AUSactive National Gala Awards and Summit coming to Melbourne in 2023. Save the date Friday, 15.09.23 and prepare your nomination application.
data.text:

When we all pull together as an industry and put our collective weight behind an initiative, incredible things happen. MillionMoves on the Sunshine Coast achieved over 2 million moves from a demographic who donâ€™t use our gyms and facilities. Remarkably, 70% of participants reported having at least one chronic illness that could be improved with exercise. Thank you for being a vital part of this journey. Access the draft Pilates Industry Guideline and have your sayâ€¦ https://zurl.co/SZO0 #AUSactive #Pilates #PilatesIndustryGuidelines

AUSactive has today launched its first Digital Futures Research Report, providing insights and data from more than 450 businesses that can be used as benchmarking tools for how health and fitness businesses can embrace technology for future growth and greater efficiency. Building on research conducted by ukactive and Rewrite Digital, the Digital Futures Report is an assessment of the digital maturity of health and fitness operators from all across Australia. AUSactive CEO Barrie Elvish said the report was a great foundation and learning tool for fitness businesses to assess and embrace technology that can benefit the future of their business and member experience. â€œThe health and fitness sector faces a stronger than ever necessity to drive digital change to create fulfilling customer experiences and provide value for money. This is key to the sectorâ€™s survival and growth. To continue reading, please click here: https://zurl.co/rRdh To access the executive summary, please click here: https://zurl.co/hVLo #DigitalFutures #ResearchPiece #Digital #Information #AUSactive #KeyDigitalFindings
